long_description: This durable 1100ml. cooking pot also serves as a handy storage container--locking lid keeps contents from spilling. Dual purpose handle/lid lock flips up and over the fitted lid to securely lock the lid in place during transport. Fitted lid with a top handle. Scratch and dent resistant stainless steel stands up in the most rugged conditions. Rounded corners help heat travel up sides of pot more quickly, boosting efficiency.
short_description: This durable 1100ml. cooking pot also serves as a handy storage container--locking lid keeps contents from spilling.
